meanings.definition: In a way that can be perceived or noticed.
meanings.sent1: The bird flew perceivably across the sky.
meanings.sent2: She perceivably smiled at the joke.
meanings.sent3: The cat perceivably tried to catch its tail.
meanings.sent4: The music played perceivably in the background.
meanings.sent5: The stars shone perceivably in the night sky.

meanings.definition: Capable of being seen or understood.
meanings.sent1: The perceivably bright sun warmed the beach.
meanings.sent2: The instructions were perceivably clear to follow.
meanings.sent3: The cake was perceivably delicious to the guests.
meanings.sent4: His talent was perceivably shining on the stage.
meanings.sent5: The mountain was perceivably majestic against the horizon.
